docs.snippet: Two embattled cabinet secretaries — Ben Carson and David Shulkin — remained in their jobs Friday. The absence of any formal announcements suggested an effort to tamp down the anxiety in the West Wing.

headline.main: Despite Speculation, Trump’s Cabinet Remains Intact
